Description: Postcard; printed paper; satirical watercolour drawing showing a Western tourist being pulled and pushed up the Great Pyramid at Giza by local guides.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked Cairo, 17th December 1903; the limited space allowed for a message on the front has been filled with the following: "Don't you think you would like to be hauled up, like that man!! Our love & best wishes for a Merry Xmas 1903".
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khufu
